list.error_calendar_name_taken: This calendar name is already taken
list.error_invalid_calendar_name: Invalid calendar name. Must be 3-24 characters, start with a letter/number, and can contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens (hyphens not allowed at start or end)
list.calendar_name_help: Calendar names must be 3-24 characters long, start with a letter or number, and can contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens (hyphens not allowed at the beginning or end)

selector.select_calendar_instructions: Please select a calendar for your event:
selector.no_calendars: You don't have any calendars. Please create one first.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.noEventsDescription: You don't have any events in this calendar yet.

editors.title: Calendar Editors
editors.no_editors: No editors have been granted access to this calendar.
editors.no_editors_description: Add editors to allow others to manage this calendar with you.
editors.account_id_help: Enter the account ID or email address of the person you want to grant edit access to.
editors.confirm_remove_message: Are you sure you want to remove edit access for {{email}}?
editors.error_permission_denied: You don't have permission to manage editors for this calendar
editors.error_editor_already_exists: This person already has edit access to this calendar
editors.error_invite_already_exists: An invitation has already been sent to this email address
editors.confirm_leave_message: Are you sure you want to leave this calendar? You will no longer have edit access and will need to be re-invited to regain access.

management.error_loading_calendar: Unable to load calendar. Please try again later.
management.title: Category Management
management.no_categories_description: You haven't created any event categories yet.
management.category_name_help: Choose a descriptive name for this event category
management.confirm_delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This category is assigned to {{count}} events.
management.category_deleted_success: Category deleted successfully. {{count}} events were affected.
management.merge_categories_description: Select which category should be kept. All events from the other selected categories will be moved to the target category.
management.categories_merged_success: Categories merged successfully. {{count}} events were affected.

bulk_operations.select_all_events: Select all events in this view
bulk_operations.select_categories_required: Please select at least one category to assign
bulk_operations.no_categories_available: No categories available. Create categories first to assign them to events.
bulk_operations.events_not_found: Some events were not found or could not be accessed
bulk_operations.categories_not_found: Some categories were not found or are not available
bulk_operations.mixed_calendar_events: All selected events must be from the same calendar
bulk_operations.insufficient_permissions: You don't have permission to modify some of the selected events
bulk_operations.assignment_failed: Failed to assign categories. Please try again.

search_filter.search_placeholder: Search by event name or description...

settings.title: Calendar Settings
settings.default_date_range_help: When visitors view your public calendar without specifying a date range, events will be filtered to show this time period starting from today.

widget.domains_section_intro: Specify which website is allowed to embed your calendar widget. Your calendar can only be embedded on one external domain.
widget.config_section_intro: Customize how your calendar widget appears when embedded on external websites.
widget.embed_section_intro: Copy this code and paste it into your website's HTML to display your calendar widget.

domains.add_domain_help: Enter the domain where you want to embed your calendar, without protocol (e.g., example.com or blog.example.org:8080). You can only specify one domain.
domains.no_domains: No domains have been added yet. Add domains to allow them to embed your calendar widget.
domains.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to change your allowed domain? This will remove {{domain}} and allow you to add a different domain.
domains.remove_success: Domain removed successfully. You can now add a different domain.
domains.error_invalid_domain: Invalid domain format. Domain must not include protocol or path (e.g., use 'example.com' instead of 'https://example.com/').
domains.error_duplicate: This domain is already in the allowed list

config.configuration_description: Customize the appearance and behavior of your calendar widget.
config.view_mode_help: Choose how events are displayed in the widget by default.
config.accent_color_help: Choose a color for links, buttons, and interactive elements in the widget.
config.preview_description: See how your widget will look with the current settings.

embed.title: Embed Code
embed.description: Copy and paste this code into your website's HTML where you want the calendar to appear.
embed.copy_error: Failed to copy to clipboard. Please copy manually.
